Reviews.Title: Can t watch video on youtube
Reviews.Author: Kane
Reviews.Content: Product arrive on time but I'm experiencing some problem watching video on YouTube it stop and go and it s really frustrating other than that works good for what I need

ProductInfo.Features:
Allwinner A20 Dual Core Processor;  Google Android 4.2 (Jelly Bean) OS
8GB Internal Memory; microSD expansion up to 32GB
10.1 inch LCD Multi-Touch Display; Unique design; 1280-by-720 Resolution
Wi-Fi (802.11a/b/g/n); 2.0MP rear camera, 0.3MP front facing camera
ProductInfo.Name: Epassion 10" Android 4.2 Jellybean 8gb Touchscreen Tablet. 1.2ghz Dual Core Processor. 1gb Ram Memory. Dual Camera. Wifi & 3g Ready. Hdmi 1.4 Port. In Black
